actions.text: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 237.

Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Ayotte. (consideration: CR S8169, S8179) To propose alternative requirements and limitations applicable to individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2255 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Ayotte.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 237.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2255, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 237.

purpose: To propose alternative requirements and limitations applicable to individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
